title: How to play urf
body:
I want to know how to play urf because ive seen people play urf on twitch and on yt but i dont know how.please tell me.
Also i want to know how to make a green pathway on the map to where your going.

replies.body:
They may be streaming content on the PBE.  Snow Battle ARURF is aimed from 12/19/17 at 8:00 a.m. PT â€“ 1/2/18 at 7:55 a.m. PT.   [Patch notes](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-724-notes#patch-upcoming-events) for more info! :D

Not sure what you mean about the green pathway, could you clarify?
Thank you for the support really helped out

They might be streaming from the beta servers. It will be coming to the live game soon enough.

For the second part of your post, you're probably talking about the "On My Way" [Smart Ping](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752974-Smart-Ping).
